data.message: Is there someone who I can talk to about one of your company's offers?

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Herby. This is a great place to ask questions. Let us know how we can help. -Jessica

Hello Ms Jessica, A man name Michael Stone Burton has been trying to say I won a prize from one of your company's office in London, He says he work for Facebook and want me to pay for the prize to be shipped, Is there a person by that name who works for your company, and if I did win a prize, why can't  it be sent to the California office where he says I would meet Mr. Zuckerberg?

Hello,how come I'm not getting answers to my questions ab out Mr. Burton? Your company just let people use your company's name, you know a lot of people like and trust your company, but I bring something to your company attention and don't get a response?
Me gusta  se parese qua se un esperimeyo
Herby Bowman do you really think this is legit? Please use common sense
How are u  nw  its ok poh
Lene Den Yarazzaq Mallyna Azza Grillstudiobn Lai Rae Stuffs Zahraa Zihni
